Ive been playing this game since 2014 with some of my best friends. There have been periods that I have had to take long breaks, but I still end up coming back every time. The competitive but simple nature make it one of the most fun,competitive FPS titles ever.

I can not recommend this game less, iv'e sunk 1200 hours into this shit show and got to supreme so i think i know what im talking about. This game has devolved into a cheaters paradise, every other game there is at least one cheater, ive gone into high ranked games with boosted players who dont even have basic knowledge of the game. Even in high trust factor ive gotten spin botters, griefers, toxic assholes etc. If you want to enjoy this game use faceit. matchmaking is fucking disgraceful, but hey at least we have HD chickens now, thanks Valve!
